query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: "SOPO Lab second session ""Create: going into the details of challenges and designing roadmaps"""
result.description: This deliverable will work on the insights obtained in the firstround session of the social policy labs and will provide roadmaps for policy creation as well as requirements in terms of users needs regarding the urban mobility services

result.title: Communication strategy for policy makers (final)
result.description: The Communication strategy will identify main communication channels platforms and media addressing policy makers on local national and EU level and across policy domains relevant for Design enabled Innovation It will increase awareness among policy makers of their role in creating Design enabled Innovation friendlyecosystems and thus stimulate the upscaling and enhancement of Design enabled Innovation in cities across Europe The communication strategy is developed in M27 monitored during the project number of people reached satisfaction rates and updated on a yearly basis in M36 and M48

result.title: Urban design enabled Innovation Training Modules (final edition)
result.description: This deliverable develops a framework to guide and evaluate the activities in the City Labs and various supporting training modules to prepare the innovators for the organization of City Labs Training modules are for instance Embedded Selfreflection AAU Communication strategies WC Innovation management SURREY Knowledge brokerage UVEG Building policy networks ANCI New governance and business models POLIMI etc A draft of the deliverable will be issued in M12 and the final edition in M48

result.title: Report on working together with 18 Innovation Agencies
result.description: D43 will summarise the activities and the results of the localy organised WS for the innovation Agencies 3 per Project partner Each partner will provide the input for the the deliverable which will be elaborated by the FSS The objective is to encourage other Innovation agencies to perform policy experimentations and also to inform them about the Innovation Audit tool for Social innovation
